common_0220_rival_00: All right, here I am! We finally made it, huh?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0220_rival_01: This is Mesagoza! The biggest city in Paldea![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0220_rival_02:
It’s been a big trade hub since a long time ago.\c
Lots of folks come here to learn about advances
in technology and all kinds of other stuff.[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0220_rival_03:
There’s a hair salon where you can change your
look, plus places with tasty food and fixings...[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0220_rival_04:
[VAR BD06(0000)]What do you want to see first,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0220_rival_05a:
Oh, you’re a fashionista, are you?\c
Or maybe you just want a practical ’do that won’t
get in your eyes when you’re battling![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0220_rival_05b:
Hah! I didn’t have you pegged for a big eater!\c
But that’s smart. You can’t battle well with a
growling tummy, right?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0220_rival_07:
I wanna be sure you’ll be able to Terastallize
your Pokémon too, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0220_rival_08:
There’s a few things that gotta get done for that
to happen, but I’ll take care of ’em![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0220_rival_09:
Meanwhile, you just have fun looking around the
city a bit![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0220_rival_12:
There’s so much to do—grab a bite, buy some
accessories to spice up your uniform...[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0220_rival_13:
If you want my personal recommendation, you’ve
gotta see Delibird Presents! They sell handy\r
items for Pokémon to hold.[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0220_rival_10:
Once you’ve seen your fill, we can meet up again
in front of the school!\c
Just...be ready. The stairs up to school are
no joke.[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0220_rival_11: Later, then! Get pumped for some Terastallizing![VAR 0114(0004)]
